alert.note: Alert for Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 12 at 8:20PM CDT until August 13 at 5:06PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Pecatonica River at Freeport, which affects parts of Stephenson County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Pecatonica River at Freeport. * WHEN...Until late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flood Stage. Water affects low lying sections of Freeport mainly east of the Pecatonica River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 13.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage overnight and into the morning. The river will continue falling to 7.5 feet by next Friday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning.
